data.text: @ThePerezHilton Completely unprofessional. Would you be ok with medical professionals making fun of fattys whose lifestyle disgust them (said crudely for the sake of the argument and a perspective) or perhaps they make fun of the women getting her 10 abortion? Maybe someone with lice?

@ThePerezHilton So his brain was likely deprived of O2 and he comes to slightly delirious, and likely unaware of what he’s even saying and the doctor treating him feels the need to humiliate and exploit that? If I’m him and I see this she’s getting a hipaa violation very fast
@ThePerezHilton 35 years of nursing will get you tons of stories of crazy, wierd, sad, funny, and interesting patients.
